channel.title: Tech on Steve Hemingway's website
channel.description: Recent content in Tech on Steve Hemingway's website

item.title: Aggregates Yard Planning Application
item.description: Yesterday I spoke at a Planning Control Committee meeting. I was supporting the Parish Council, in the form of Cllr Roger Willcocks, in objecting to application, ‘17/02652/1 - 135A LONDON ROAD, KNEBWORTH, SG3 6EX’. This is the conversion of the old aggregates yard, part of Chas Lowe & Sons, into two 2-bed flats and two commercial (retail) units. The grounds on which we objected were principally to do with parking.

item.title: Steve Hemingway's Corner of the World Wide Web
item.description: I decided to load up my regular columns for Knebworth Parish News onto this website. I occasionally post things here, but for anything I have to say that can be fitted into 280 characters, I tend to use Twitter. This website does not use cookies, but even if it did you should not be worried about them. I don’t keep any information about you, although I am registered with the ICO, just in case.
